name: Indian Straight
description:
Indian Straight is beautiful,and soft with a slight wave pattern.The hair can be flat iron for a sleek look, thermal curled, and wet set.
Each Bundle:
*3.5 oz (8-16oz. is needed for a full sew-in depending on length)
* Available in 8-26 inches
*100% Remy Human Hair (can be tinted)
*Reusable lasting up to 18 months with proper care
*Grade AAA Quality
*Tangle-Free
*Minimal to No Shedding
FOR 4  BUNDLES PLEASE LEAVE YOUR BUNDLE INCHES UP TO 26" IN "NOTE TO SELLER BOX"

name: Indian Bodywave
description:
Indian Body Wave is full of beautiful free flowing waves and ultimate body. The hair extremely versatile! It can be worn on its natural wavy state with great curl definition, and thermal curled (holds beautiful long lasting curls full of volume). It can be straightened, however frequent straightening over time can cause the hair to become straighter. 
 
Each Bundle:
*3.5 oz (8-16oz. is needed for a full sew-in depending on length)
* Available in 8-26 inches
*100% Remy Human Hair (can be tinted)
*Reusable lasting up to 18 months with proper care
*Grade AAA Quality
*Tangle-Free
*Minimal to No Shedding
FOR 4 BUNDLE DEAL PLEASE LEAVE INCH COMBO IN "NOTE TO SELLER BOX"

options.name: 4 BUNDLES UP TO 26' SEE DESCRIPTION BOX

name: Indian Deep Wave/Curly
description:
Indian DeepWave/Curly is full of sexy carefree curls. The hair can be worn on its natural curly state and curls held in place with your favorite curl defining cream. It can be straightened, however frequent straightening over time can cause the hair to become straighter. 
 Each Bundle:
*3.5 oz  (8-16oz. is needed for a full sew-in depending on length)
* Available in 8-26 inches
*100% Virgin Human Hair (can be tinted)
*Reusable lasting up to 18 months with proper care
*Single Drawn Hair
*Grade AAA Quality
*Tangle-Free
*Full Cuticle
*Minimal to No Shedding

name: Brazilian Lace Closure
description:
Lace Closures are available in Brazilian Body Wave only. The hair is the same quality of our weft hair. Can be used with Peruvian & Indian hairs.
Each Closure:
* Available in 8-18 inches
*Sizes 2.5x4, 4x4 (bleached knots)*
*100% Virgin Human Hair (can be tinted)
*Reusable lasting up to 6 months with proper care
*Single Drawn Hair
*Grade AAA Quality
*Tangle-Free
*Full Cuticle
*Minimal to No Shedding
